'''Radiant Spincrystal 146''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Once Upon a Time in the Vale]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located to the south of the southernmost [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Tezcatepetonco Range]].
